_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the time-series event.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The time when an event or observation occurred.

eventType.title: Event Type
eventType.description: The primary event type for this time-series record.

eventMergeId.title: ExperienceEvent merge ID
eventMergeId.description: An ID to correlate or merge multiple Experience events together that are essentially the same event or should be merged. This is intended to be populated by the data producer prior to ingestion.

endUserIDs.title: End-User IDs
endUserIDs.description: Condensed, normalized encapsulation of all end-user identifiers. Deprecated, use `xdm:identityMap` instead.

leadSource.title: Lead Source
leadSource.description: Source from where this perticlar lead come from.

createdDate.title: Created Date
createdDate.description: Date when this lead is created.

directMarketing.title: Direct marketing
directMarketing.description: Events and properties related to direct and outbound marketing such as email, direct mail, texts, and in-app notifications.

emailBouncedCategory.title: Email Bounced Category
emailBouncedCategory.description: Category in which this email failure belongs.

emailBouncedSubcategory.title: Email Bounced Subcategory
emailBouncedSubcategory.description: Subcategory this failure reason belongs to.

testVariantID.title: Test Variant ID
testVariantID.description: Unique identifier for the test variant.

testVariantName.title: Test Variant Name
testVariantName.description: Friendly name for the test variant.

environment.title: Environment
environment.description: The information related to web page and link of the ExperienceEvent.

operatingSystem.title: Operating system
operatingSystem.description: The name of the operating system used when the observation was made. The attribute should not contain any version information such as '10.5.3', but instead contain 'edition' designations such as 'Ultimate' or 'Professional'.

browserDetails.title: Browser details
browserDetails.description: The browser specific details such as browser name, version, javascript version, user agent string, and accept language.

userAgent.title: User agent
userAgent.description: The HTTP user-agent string from the client request.

ipV4.title: IPv4
ipV4.description: The numerical label assigned to a device participating in a computer network that uses the Internet Protocol for communication.

device.title: Device
device.description: An identified device, application or device browser instance that is trackable across sessions, normally by cookies.

model.title: Model
model.description: The name of the model for the device. This is the common, human-readable, or marketing name for the device. For example, the 'iPhone 6S' is a particular model of mobile phone.

web.title: Web
web.description: The information related to web page and link of the ExperienceEvent.

name.title: Name
name.description: The normative name of the web page. This name is not necessarily the page title or directly associate with page content, but is used to organize a site's pages for classification purposes.

queryParamaters.title: Query Paramaters
queryParamaters.description: Query Paramters used for the web page.

URL.title: URL
URL.description: The normative or usual URL of the web page.  This may or may not be the actual URL used to reach the page, which would be recorded using `Web Link`.

isPersonalizedURL.title: Is Personalized URL
isPersonalizedURL.description: Personalized URL of the web page.  This may or may not be the actual URL used to reach the page, which would be recorded using `Web Link`.

isSuccessful.title: Is Successful
isSuccessful.description: Is the change successful or failed in process.

search.title: Search
search.description: The information related to web or mobile search.

searchEngine.title: Search engine
searchEngine.description: The search engine used by the search.

advertising.title: Advertising
advertising.description: Information related to advertising activity in ExperienceEvents.

application.title: Application
application.description: This mixin is used to capture application information related to an ExperienceEvent, including the name of the application, app version, installs, launches, crashes, and closures. It could be either the application targeted by the event like the send of a push notification or the application originating the event such as a click, or a login.

cardActivated.title: Card Activated Success
cardActivated.description: Tracks when a card has been successfully activated.

cardActivationStart.title: Card Activation Started
cardActivationStart.description: Tracks when a card activation process has been started.

cardCancelled.title: Card Cancelled
cardCancelled.description: Tracks when a card has been cancelled.

cardControlsLocked.title: Card Controls Locked
cardControlsLocked.description: Tracks when a card controls have been locked.

cardControlsUnlocked.title: Card Controls Unlocked
cardControlsUnlocked.description: Tracks when a card controls have been unlocked.

cardLocked.title: Card Locked
cardLocked.description: Tracks when a card has been locked.

cardOrderNew.title: Order New Card
cardOrderNew.description: Tracks when a card has been requested.

cardOrderType.title: Card Order Type
cardOrderType.description: Tracks the type of card order associated with a card order event.

cardType.title: Card Type
cardType.description: Tracks the type of card associated with an event.

cardUnlocked.title: Card Unlocked
cardUnlocked.description: Tracks when a card has been unlocked.

loan.title: Loan
loan.description: Extension of form application data type.

accountCardsTotal.title: Account Cards Total
accountCardsTotal.description: Total number of account (financial) cards assigned to a user.

assignedBeneficiary.title: Assigned Beneficiaries
assignedBeneficiary.description: Captures the beneficiary(s) assigned to the account.

creditScore.title: Credit Score
creditScore.description: Refers to a number between 300-850 that depicts a consumer's creditworthiness.

employmentStatus.title: Employment Status
employmentStatus.description: Tracks the employment status of the user.

filingJointly.title: Filing Jointly
filingJointly.description: Refers to a filing status for married couples that have wed before the end of the tax year.

filingSeparately.title: Filing Separately
filingSeparately.description: Refers to married couples who choose to record their respective incomes, exemptions, and deductions on separate tax returns.

hasAssignedBeneficiary.title: Has Assigned Beneficiary
hasAssignedBeneficiary.description: Flag determining if the account has a beneficiary assigned.

isHeadOfHousehold.title: Head of Household
isHeadOfHousehold.description: Users designed as head of household if they pay more than half the cost of supporting and housing a qualifying person.

householdIncome.title: Household Income
householdIncome.description: Refers to the combined gross income of all members of a household.

singleFiler.title: Single Filer
singleFiler.description: Refers to a taxpayer who is unmarried and does not qualify for any other filing status.

taxBracket.title: Tax Bracket
taxBracket.description: Refers to a range of incomes subject to a certain income tax rate.

cardApplicationSteps.title: Card Application Steps
cardApplicationSteps.description: Extension of form application data type.

creditLimitIncrease.title: Credit Limit Increase
creditLimitIncrease.description: Extension of form application data type.

channel.title: Experience channel
channel.description: Experience channel related to the ExperienceEvent.

productListItems.title: Product list items
productListItems.description: A list of items representing a product selected by a customer with specific options and pricing that are for that usage context at a specific point of time and may differ from the product record.

commerce.title: Commerce
commerce.description: Commerce specific data related to this event.

placeContext.title: Place context
placeContext.description: The transient circumstances related to the observation. Examples include locale specific information such as weather, local time, traffic, day of the week, workday vs. holiday, and working hours.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: The information related to marketing activities that are active with the touchpoint.

media.title: Media
media.description: Media activity information related to the experience event.

segmentMemberships.title: Segment Memberships
segmentMemberships.description: The segments associated with this ExperienceEvent. Deprecated, use `xdm:segmentMembership` instead.

dataSource.title: Data source
dataSource.description: Globally unique identification of a data source.

receivedTimestamp.title: Received time stamp
receivedTimestamp.description: The time at which this interaction was received by a server.

fileDownload.title: File Download
fileDownload.description: Tracks all details of a file download. Extension of file transfer data type.

fileUpload.title: File Upload
fileUpload.description: Tracks all details of a file upload. Extension of file transfer data type.

implementationDetails.title: Implementation details
implementationDetails.description: The details of the software used to collect the ExperienceEvent.

knowledgeBaseArticeID.title: Knowledge Base Article ID
knowledgeBaseArticeID.description: Tracks the knowledge base article ID when it has been viewed.

knowledgeBaseArticleType.title: Knowledge Base Article Type
knowledgeBaseArticleType.description: Tracks the knowledge base article type when it has been viewed.

knowledgeBaseArticleView.title: Knowledge Base Article View
knowledgeBaseArticleView.description: Tracked when a knowledge base article has been viewed.

offerClicks.title: Offer Clicks
offerClicks.description: Counts the number of times an offer has been clicked.

offerDismissals.title: Offer Dismissals
offerDismissals.description: Counts the number of times an offer has been dismissed.

offerImpressions.title: Offer Impression Details
offerImpressions.description: An array of advertisements that have been displayed to a customer.

socialContent.title: Social Share Content
socialContent.description: Tracks the page/content/value of the item being shared.

socialFollow.title: Social Follow
socialFollow.description: Tracks when a social follow event has occurred.

socialNetwork.title: Social Share Network
socialNetwork.description: Tracks the social sharing network in use, i.e. Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

socialShare.title: Social Share Event
socialShare.description: Tracks when a social sharing event has occurred.

userAccountPersonalDetails.title: User Account Personal Details
userAccountPersonalDetails.description: Extension of the Personal Profile data type.

userAccountStart.title: User Account Start Date
userAccountStart.description: Date when the account was opened.

userAccountStatus.title: User Account Status
userAccountStatus.description: This should describe the current status of the account

userAccountSwitch.title: Switch User Accounts
userAccountSwitch.description: Captures when a visitor switches their account during a visit.

userAccountType.title: User Account Type
userAccountType.description: Captures the user account type, if applicable.

userAccountPreferences.title: User Account Preferences
userAccountPreferences.description: M/F, other shopping preferences. Preferences in personal profile is already captured- things like perferred method of contact, not shopping prefs.

userCookieConsentAccepted.title: Cookie Consent Accepted
userCookieConsentAccepted.description: Tracked when a visitor opts-in to allowing cookies to be set within their browser.

userCookieConsentViewed.title: Cookie Consent Viewed
userCookieConsentViewed.description: Tracked when a visitor views the cookie consent information.

userForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
userForgotPassword.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the forgot password process.

userForgotUsername.title: Forgot Username
userForgotUsername.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the forgot username process.

userLogin.title: Visitor Login
userLogin.description: Counter event indicating a successful visitor login.

userLoginBiometric.title: Biometric Authentication
userLoginBiometric.description: Flag determining if the user has used a biometric authentication process to login.

userLoginFailure.title: Visitor Login Failure
userLoginFailure.description: Counter event indicating a failed visitor login attempt.

userLoginLocation.title: Login Page Location
userLoginLocation.description: When multiple login locations exist on the page, this value should be used to identify the specific location the user used for login

userLoginKeychain.title: Keychain
userLoginKeychain.description: Flag determining if the user has used a keychain authentication process to login.

userLoginMultiFactor.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
userLoginMultiFactor.description: Flag determining if the user has used a multi-factor authentication process to login.

userLoginStatus.title: Login Status
userLoginStatus.description: Used to track the current login status for site visitors, regardless of whether login occurred as a result of a login during the current session or a previous session as identified by a cookie value.

userLoginThirdParty.title: Login with Third Party
userLoginThirdParty.description: Counter event that is incremented when a visitor has used another login network to authenticate, such as Apple, Facebook, or Google.

userLoginThirdPartySite.title: Third Party Login Site
userLoginThirdPartySite.description: Tracks the site used to authetnicate when a third-party sign-in event is tracked.

userLogout.title: Visitor Logout
userLogout.description: Counter event indicating a successful visitor logout.

userResetPassword.title: Reset Password
userResetPassword.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the reset password process.

userSessionTimeout.title: Session Timeout
userSessionTimeout.description: Tracked when a visitor has an authenticated session that is automatically logged out after a predetermined amount of time.

userUpdate.title: Account Profile Update
userUpdate.description: Counter event indicating a user has updated their account profile.

profileStitch.title: Profile stitch
profileStitch.description: Details about the IDs that were joined by profile stitching.

pushNotificationTracking.title: push notification tracking details
pushNotificationTracking.description: Describes interaction with a push notification.

customAction.title: custom action
customAction.description: End user clicked custom action in the push notification

value.title: value
value.description: value associated with the custom action, if any

pushProviderMessageID.title: Push Provider message ID
pushProviderMessageID.description: ID assigned to this notification as assigned by the push provider

pushProvider.title: Push Provider
pushProvider.description: Push provider, e.g. apns or fcm

quoteDiscount.title: Quote Discount
quoteDiscount.description: Records the discount amount for a quote displayed to a visitor.

quotePremium.title: Quote Premium
quotePremium.description: Records the premium amount for a quote displayed to a visitor.

quoteRequestLocation.title: Quote Request Location
quoteRequestLocation.description: Captures the postal code used for finding retailers near the visitor's location.

quoteRequestPersonalDetails.title: Quote Request Personal Details
quoteRequestPersonalDetails.description: Extension of the Personal Profile data type.

quoteRequestSelectedRetailer.title: Selected Retailer
quoteRequestSelectedRetailer.description: Captures the selected retailer for a quote request, if applicable.

surveyAnswers.title: Survey Answers
surveyAnswers.description: An array of the answers provided by the visitor within a survey.

surveyID.title: Survey ID
surveyID.description: ID for the specific survey taken.

surveyQuestions.title: Survey Questions
surveyQuestions.description: An array of the questions presented to the visitor within a survey.

alertClicks.title: Alert Clicks
alertClicks.description: Counts the number of times an alert has been clicked.

alertDismissals.title: Alert Dismissals
alertDismissals.description: Counts the number of times an alert has been dismissed.

alertImpressions.title: Alert Impression Details
alertImpressions.description: An array of alerts that have been displayed to a customer.

claimID.title: Claim ID
claimID.description: ID of the claim being submitted.

claimStartDate.title: Claim Start Date
claimStartDate.description: Date the claim was successfully submitted.

claimStatus.title: Claim Status
claimStatus.description: Captures the status of the claim for any given point in the application process.

chatDeclined.title: Chat Declined
chatDeclined.description: Captured when an offered chat is declined by a visitor.

chatEnd.title: Chat End
chatEnd.description: Captured when a chat is ended with a visitor.

chatOffered.title: Chat Offered
chatOffered.description: Captures the number of times a chat session has been offered to a visitor.

chatSessionID.title: Chat Session ID
chatSessionID.description: Captures the chat session identifier, if available.

chatStart.title: Chat Start
chatStart.description: Captured when a chat is initiated with a visitor.

clickToCall.title: Click to Call
clickToCall.description: Visitor initiates a call to the client from a telephone number link on the site/app.

clickToDirectMessage.title: Click to Direct Message
clickToDirectMessage.description: Visitor initiates a direct message or feedback to the client from a direct message form on the site/app.

clickToEmail.title: Click to Email
clickToEmail.description: Visitor initiates an email to the client from an email link on the site/app.

clickToText.title: Click to Text
clickToText.description: Visitor initiates a SMS/text message to the client from a SMS/text link on the site/app.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: Subject of contact requested by the visitor, such as in-store purchase support, online order support, credit customer service, etc.

callBackNumber.title: Call Back Contact Information
callBackNumber.description: The contact phone number the visitor uses for responses to contact requests.

replyToEmailAddress.title: Reply to Email Address
replyToEmailAddress.description: The email address the visitor uses for responses to contact requests.
